name: Soul Ring
description: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Temporarily grants the wielder mana, at the cost of health.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Upon losing the buff, any of the unspent mana is removed again.
If the max mana pool was increased, it gets reverted back as well.
Only counts actual mana used. Other mana modifying abilities do not count.
Recasting Sacrifice fully stacks, with each cast placing a separate, independent buff.
If the mana bonus would exceed the max mana pool, a buffer is created that increases the max mana pool based on the amount that exceeds it. This buffer is as temporary as well.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
6 main attack damage to Strength heroes.
2.7 main attack damage to universal heroes.
